issue.title: [CF 1359] where are the TMW options saved
issue.body:
I had to rename cache, wtf and interface to *old to tshoot d/c issues.

Disabled all addons, restarted game.  All good!

 

Then I went back and copied the 2 TMW folders back from interfaceold to the new interface folder.

 

Now all my options and setups for all my different classes are gone?

 

Where are these options stored?  Their not in the tellmewhen_options folder because I copied it back to the new folder?


> Posted by CurseForge user gcordle | Imported from CurseForge issue #1359 | Raw

comments.body:
TellMeWhen_Options is the settings for the options. TellMeWhen is the settings for TMW.

Edited Jan 4, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
